# Events

### Will you be at one of these events?  We’d love to see you.

## Upcoming Webinars

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4778350/4C3354432074CE51CFEF0F888AFE0B77?partnerref=eventpage)

![What Drives Consumer Trust in Biometrics?](https://www.aware.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/consumer-trust-webinar-face-recognition.png)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4778350/4C3354432074CE51CFEF0F888AFE0B77?partnerref=eventpage)

### From Hesitation to Adoption: What Drives Consumer Trust in Biometrics?

#### Wednesday, December 04, 2024 | 2PM EST | 1 hour

The need for secure, convenient, and privacy-preserving user authentication has never been more critical–and biometric technology is a perfect fit. But many organizations are still hesitant to adopt biometrics due to misconceptions about consumer attitudes.

We wanted to know what the average user REALLY thinks about biometrics, and so, we conducted the first ever comprehensive consumer survey around biometric preferences, attitudes and perceptions.

Whether you have concerns about biometrics or simply want to learn more about how to unlock the consumer mindset, join us on Wednesday December 4th at 2PM for our free webinar to unpack our survey findings.

[REGISTER NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4702369/10F20DB87EC28AA213B62F61E22F9ADA?partnerref=eventpage)

## On-demand Webinars

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4702369/10F20DB87EC28AA213B62F61E22F9ADA?partnerref=eventpage)

![](https://www.aware.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/heidi-webinar.png)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4702369/10F20DB87EC28AA213B62F61E22F9ADA?partnerref=eventpage)

### Unpacking Trust in Digital Identity Seminar: Biometrics and the Consumer Mindset

Join Heidi Hunter, Chief Product Officer at Aware, as she explores the benefits of biometric technology to take the market where it needs to go.

In this webinar, you’ll hear directly from Heidi, an industry expert with extensive experience in digital identity, as she delves into the latest research on consumer attitudes toward biometrics. She’ll debunk common myths, reveal surprising statistics, and share practical strategies on how to balance convenience, security, and privacy in digital authentication.

Whether you’re looking to gain a competitive edge or simply want to stay informed about the future of digital security, this webinar is a must-attend event. You’ll leave with actionable insights that can help you integrate biometric technology into your systems responsibly and effectively.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4702369/10F20DB87EC28AA213B62F61E22F9ADA?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4640220/D24CEAF4692D02C08A5905B5BCB5FED3?partnerref=eventpage)

![Liveness & Matching KPI]()

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4640220/D24CEAF4692D02C08A5905B5BCB5FED3?partnerref=eventpage)

### Liveness & Matching KPI Workshop – Part 2: Spotlight on Liveness and Deepfakes

#### 1 hour

Achieving optimal performance in biometric liveness and deepfakes is crucial for robust security. Striking the right balance is essential: undershooting targets leaves systems vulnerable, while overambitious goals can complicate implementation and reduce user adoption. In this educational session, join Dr. Terry Riopka and Dhwani Trivedi for Part 2: Spotlight on Liveness and Deepfakes of this micro-series to explore the nuanced approach Aware takes in developing industry-leading biometric technology.

[REGISTER NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4640220/D24CEAF4692D02C08A5905B5BCB5FED3?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4619243/E32ADB83CFC20C44D60D0D968FEB5C3A?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4619243/E32ADB83CFC20C44D60D0D968FEB5C3A?partnerref=eventpage)

### Liveness & Matching KPI Workshop Part 1: Spotlight on Matching and Bias

#### 1 hour

Achieving optimal performance in biometric matching and liveness detection is crucial for robust security. Striking the right balance is essential: undershooting targets leaves systems vulnerable, while overambitious goals can complicate implementation and reduce user adoption. In this educational session, join Dr. Terry Riopka and Dhwani Trivedi for Part 1 of this micro-series to explore the nuanced approach Aware takes in developing industry-leading biometric technology.

[REGISTER NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4619243/E32ADB83CFC20C44D60D0D968FEB5C3A?partnerref=eventpage)

### Safeguarding Integrity in Education: Tackling Identity Fraud and Proxy Testing with Biometrics

#### 1 hour

In an era where integrity in Education is more crucial than ever, understanding and implementing security measures is vital. Join Aware, in partnership with PeopleCert, for a webinar on “Safeguarding Integrity in Education: Tackling Identity Fraud and Proxy Testing with Biometrics.” This session will explore how biometric technologies are redefining security protocols within educational institutions.

[REGISTER NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4590122/AE958C5092BE37E088076FD1D91F8149?partnerref=eventpage)

### Segurança e Regulamentação no Mercado de Apostas Online

#### 1 hora

Você está convidado para o nosso webinar ‘Segurança e Regulamentação no Mercado de Apostas Online’, onde exploraremos como as soluções de verificação de identidade da Aware podem beneficiar seu negócio.

Descubra como a implementação de tecnologias de verificação de identidade pode transformar o mercado de apostas esportivas online no Brasil. Junte-se a Mario Cesar Santos, VP Global de Soluções da Aware, e Eduardo Braga, Gerente de Vendas LATAM da Aware, Leticia Teixeira, Gerente de Marketing de Produto e Rubens de Souza, Engenheiro de Suporte ao Consumidor em uma discussão detalhada sobre as soluções de biometria.

[Inscreva-se agora!](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4590122/AE958C5092BE37E088076FD1D91F8149?partnerref=eventpage)

### Where & How Biometrics are Disrupting the Gaming Market

#### 30 minutes

The Gaming market constantly changes, which means the security protocols and technologies within it must too. As constantly evolving threats emerge, user safety and data protection are essential. Don’t miss this opportunity! The Gaming market has never been subject to so much interest and attention around the world, than it is today. Register now!

#### En español

## Comprendiendo la Autenticación Biométrica: Elija la Mejor Modalidad para su Negocio

En este seminario web, exploraremos el mundo de la autenticación biométrica y te proporcionaremos conocimientos esenciales para que puedas tomar decisiones informadas sobre la mejor modalidad para tu negocio.

Los expertos en Biometría, Fernando Aleman y Oriana Salazar analizarán las tendencias actuales, las distintas modalidades biométricas disponibles y responderán a preguntas clave sobre la implementación exitosa de esta tecnología.

No te pierdas esta oportunidad de adquirir conocimientos valiosos sobre la autenticación biométrica y descubrir cómo elegir la mejor modalidad para impulsar la seguridad de tu negocio.

[¡Inscríbete ahora mismo!](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4529468/E5702A51213CEA40CC96D241AFA10883?partnerref=eventpage)

### Tackling Bias in Biometrics: Ethical and Technical Considerations for Diversity and Equity

#### 45 minutes

Join us for our upcoming webinar, “Tackling Bias in Biometrics: Ethical and Technical Considerations for Diversity and Equity,” where Dr. Mohamed Lazzouni will explore the discussion on the importance of diversity and equity in biometric technologies to avoid bias. The webinar will be hosted by Delaney Gembis, Marketing Communications Manager at Aware, who will focus on the challenges and solutions of bias in biometric algorithms.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4368597/432902F5CF3D8A8C5996395371884A06?partnerref=eventpage)

### [Access Control Time Machine: From Past Pioneers to Future Frontiers](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

Discover how access control has evolved over the years. In this presentation by Gina Rodrigues, Vice President, Marketing at Aware, learn about key changes that have shaped access control practices and shed light on the cutting-edge technologies driving its future.

Then get expert insights from James Beecham, Founder and CEO of ALTR, Robert Eckel, CEO of Aware, and Lindsay Savarino, Senior Director of HR at Aware, to explore the varying perspectives different areas of business bring to the access control landscape.

Don’t miss this opportunity to delve into the changing landscape of access control and equip yourself with the knowledge to secure your organization’s privacy, assets, and data. 

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4368597/432902F5CF3D8A8C5996395371884A06?partnerref=eventpage)

In this webinar, we will explore the growing problem of health insurance fraud and delve into the innovative solutions offered by biometric technology and behavioral analysis. Our speakers, Craig Herman from Aware, Inc. and Nelson Santini from BSI, will guide us through this critical subject.

### [Deepfake Defense Workshop: Proven Strategies for Safeguarding Your Security](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

The threat of deepfakes poses a significant risk to organizations worldwide. As deepfake technology continues to evolve, malicious actors are exploiting it to breach security measures, manipulate information, and compromise sensitive data. To help you stay one step ahead of these advanced threats, we are excited to present our “Deepfake Defense Workshop.”

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4326994/45677AA880CBDA012F68271B79308E89?partnerref=eventpage)

### [Helping Governments Deliver on the Promise of Digital ID](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

Watch this virtual session to learn more about how organizations and agencies can fully harness the power of digital ID.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4276062/08A2EA7FDE56434BBFCAC6F13167F7D6)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4198289/1110F176812CD26B3072539BA52D84BF?partnerref=eventpage)

### [How Biometrics Can Stop Synthetic Identity Fraud](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

Synthetic identity fraud is a high-level con game of constructing seemingly authentic identities without any actual human beings behind them. The cost of identity fraud knows no borders, affecting banks, healthcare providers, retail establishments, governments and ultimately the end-users—and the alarming truth is that the value of these losses continues to skyrocket annually, contributing to significant losses in several sectors worldwide.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4198289/1110F176812CD26B3072539BA52D84BF?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4152801/ED0DA50DD34039C4889CA19ECD261EB8?partnerref=eventpage)

[![Latent Logjam]()](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2965152/5EFA9BF44AD6367A34C59DEED3F504FD?partnerref=awarehomepageod)

### [Breaking the Latent Logjam](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4152801/ED0DA50DD34039C4889CA19ECD261EB8?partnerref=eventpage)

The identification of latent prints is a critical part of law enforcement’s arsenal, helping link potential suspects to crime scenes. Unfortunately, many agencies are experiencing a backlog in latent processing, resulting in increased time and expense, poor search results, and the possibility that criminals may escape prosecution. In this webinar, Scott Howard, Aware Director of Operations (AFIX/ABIS) will discuss some of the causes of backlogs, the steps necessary to address these challenges, and how AFIX Tracker can help agencies break the latent logjam.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4152801/ED0DA50DD34039C4889CA19ECD261EB8?partnerref=eventpage)

[![Webinar with Terry Riopka]()](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2965152/5EFA9BF44AD6367A34C59DEED3F504FD?partnerref=awarehomepageod)

### [The Intelligence of Mobile Biometrics](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4117710/273FB2DF1B2F769B2E108B15411F07FD?partnerref=eventpage)

Mobile, cloud, machine learning, and software encryption technologies are advancing rapidly. Dr. Terry Riopka, Senior Director of Research at Aware, will present on these recent developments using biometrics as a case study. He will discuss how advanced mobile biometric applications can inform the development of remote intelligent systems in general, and talk about developing under the constraints of a mobile environment.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4117710/273FB2DF1B2F769B2E108B15411F07FD?partnerref=eventpage)

# Events

### Will you be at one of these events?  We’d love to see you.

## Upcoming Webinars

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4778350/4C3354432074CE51CFEF0F888AFE0B77?partnerref=eventpage)

![What Drives Consumer Trust in Biometrics?](https://www.aware.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/consumer-trust-webinar-face-recognition.png)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4778350/4C3354432074CE51CFEF0F888AFE0B77?partnerref=eventpage)

### From Hesitation to Adoption: What Drives Consumer Trust in Biometrics?

#### Wednesday, December 04, 2024 | 2PM EST | 1 hour

The need for secure, convenient, and privacy-preserving user authentication has never been more critical–and biometric technology is a perfect fit. But many organizations are still hesitant to adopt biometrics due to misconceptions about consumer attitudes.

We wanted to know what the average user REALLY thinks about biometrics, and so, we conducted the first ever comprehensive consumer survey around biometric preferences, attitudes and perceptions.

Whether you have concerns about biometrics or simply want to learn more about how to unlock the consumer mindset, join us on Wednesday December 4th at 2PM for our free webinar to unpack our survey findings.

[REGISTER NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4702369/10F20DB87EC28AA213B62F61E22F9ADA?partnerref=eventpage)

## On-demand Webinars

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4702369/10F20DB87EC28AA213B62F61E22F9ADA?partnerref=eventpage)

![](https://www.aware.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/heidi-webinar.png)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4702369/10F20DB87EC28AA213B62F61E22F9ADA?partnerref=eventpage)

### Unpacking Trust in Digital Identity Seminar: Biometrics and the Consumer Mindset

Join Heidi Hunter, Chief Product Officer at Aware, as she explores the benefits of biometric technology to take the market where it needs to go.

In this webinar, you’ll hear directly from Heidi, an industry expert with extensive experience in digital identity, as she delves into the latest research on consumer attitudes toward biometrics. She’ll debunk common myths, reveal surprising statistics, and share practical strategies on how to balance convenience, security, and privacy in digital authentication.

Whether you’re looking to gain a competitive edge or simply want to stay informed about the future of digital security, this webinar is a must-attend event. You’ll leave with actionable insights that can help you integrate biometric technology into your systems responsibly and effectively.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4702369/10F20DB87EC28AA213B62F61E22F9ADA?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4640220/D24CEAF4692D02C08A5905B5BCB5FED3?partnerref=eventpage)

![Liveness & Matching KPI]()

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4640220/D24CEAF4692D02C08A5905B5BCB5FED3?partnerref=eventpage)

### Liveness & Matching KPI Workshop – Part 2: Spotlight on Liveness and Deepfakes

#### 1 hour

Achieving optimal performance in biometric liveness and deepfakes is crucial for robust security. Striking the right balance is essential: undershooting targets leaves systems vulnerable, while overambitious goals can complicate implementation and reduce user adoption. In this educational session, join Dr. Terry Riopka and Dhwani Trivedi for Part 2: Spotlight on Liveness and Deepfakes of this micro-series to explore the nuanced approach Aware takes in developing industry-leading biometric technology.

[REGISTER NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4640220/D24CEAF4692D02C08A5905B5BCB5FED3?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4619243/E32ADB83CFC20C44D60D0D968FEB5C3A?partnerref=eventpage)

![Liveness & Matching Webinar]()

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4619243/E32ADB83CFC20C44D60D0D968FEB5C3A?partnerref=eventpage)

### Liveness & Matching KPI Workshop Part 1: Spotlight on Matching and Bias

#### 1 hour

Achieving optimal performance in biometric matching and liveness detection is crucial for robust security. Striking the right balance is essential: undershooting targets leaves systems vulnerable, while overambitious goals can complicate implementation and reduce user adoption. In this educational session, join Dr. Terry Riopka and Dhwani Trivedi for Part 1 of this micro-series to explore the nuanced approach Aware takes in developing industry-leading biometric technology.

[REGISTER NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4619243/E32ADB83CFC20C44D60D0D968FEB5C3A?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4590122/AE958C5092BE37E088076FD1D91F8149?partnerref=eventpage)

![Education Integrity]()

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4590122/AE958C5092BE37E088076FD1D91F8149?partnerref=eventpage)

### Safeguarding Integrity in Education: Tackling Identity Fraud and Proxy Testing with Biometrics

#### 1 hour

In an era where integrity in Education is more crucial than ever, understanding and implementing security measures is vital. Join Aware, in partnership with PeopleCert, for a webinar on “Safeguarding Integrity in Education: Tackling Identity Fraud and Proxy Testing with Biometrics.” This session will explore how biometric technologies are redefining security protocols within educational institutions.

[REGISTER NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4590122/AE958C5092BE37E088076FD1D91F8149?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4593204/C94FF60823F4E7DBE0DB85D845278D67?partnerref=eventpage)

![Online Gaming]()

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4593204/C94FF60823F4E7DBE0DB85D845278D67?partnerref=eventpage)

### Segurança e Regulamentação no Mercado de Apostas Online

#### 1 hora

Você está convidado para o nosso webinar ‘Segurança e Regulamentação no Mercado de Apostas Online’, onde exploraremos como as soluções de verificação de identidade da Aware podem beneficiar seu negócio.

Descubra como a implementação de tecnologias de verificação de identidade pode transformar o mercado de apostas esportivas online no Brasil. Junte-se a Mario Cesar Santos, VP Global de Soluções da Aware, e Eduardo Braga, Gerente de Vendas LATAM da Aware, Leticia Teixeira, Gerente de Marketing de Produto e Rubens de Souza, Engenheiro de Suporte ao Consumidor em uma discussão detalhada sobre as soluções de biometria.

[Inscreva-se agora!](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4590122/AE958C5092BE37E088076FD1D91F8149?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4529468/E5702A51213CEA40CC96D241AFA10883?partnerref=eventpage)

![Where & How Biometrics are Disrupting the Gaming Market]()

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4529468/E5702A51213CEA40CC96D241AFA10883?partnerref=eventpage)

### Where & How Biometrics are Disrupting the Gaming Market

#### 30 minutes

The Gaming market constantly changes, which means the security protocols and technologies within it must too. As constantly evolving threats emerge, user safety and data protection are essential. Don’t miss this opportunity! The Gaming market has never been subject to so much interest and attention around the world, than it is today. Register now!

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4529468/E5702A51213CEA40CC96D241AFA10883?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4528418/AA7615AA1764297E1C1A606429B07E34?partnerref=eventspage)

![Comprendiendo Biometrica]()

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4528418/AA7615AA1764297E1C1A606429B07E34?partnerref=eventspage)

#### En español

## Comprendiendo la Autenticación Biométrica: Elija la Mejor Modalidad para su Negocio

En este seminario web, exploraremos el mundo de la autenticación biométrica y te proporcionaremos conocimientos esenciales para que puedas tomar decisiones informadas sobre la mejor modalidad para tu negocio.

Los expertos en Biometría, Fernando Aleman y Oriana Salazar analizarán las tendencias actuales, las distintas modalidades biométricas disponibles y responderán a preguntas clave sobre la implementación exitosa de esta tecnología.

No te pierdas esta oportunidad de adquirir conocimientos valiosos sobre la autenticación biométrica y descubrir cómo elegir la mejor modalidad para impulsar la seguridad de tu negocio.

[¡Inscríbete ahora mismo!](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4529468/E5702A51213CEA40CC96D241AFA10883?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4503142/2C146BBE57EFF3A4C612E401FAFEA436?partnerref=eventpage)

![Tackling Bias with Biometrics]()

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4503142/2C146BBE57EFF3A4C612E401FAFEA436?partnerref=eventpage)

### Tackling Bias in Biometrics: Ethical and Technical Considerations for Diversity and Equity

#### 45 minutes

Join us for our upcoming webinar, “Tackling Bias in Biometrics: Ethical and Technical Considerations for Diversity and Equity,” where Dr. Mohamed Lazzouni will explore the discussion on the importance of diversity and equity in biometric technologies to avoid bias. The webinar will be hosted by Delaney Gembis, Marketing Communications Manager at Aware, who will focus on the challenges and solutions of bias in biometric algorithms.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4368597/432902F5CF3D8A8C5996395371884A06?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4368597/432902F5CF3D8A8C5996395371884A06?partnerref=eventpage)

[![Deepfake Defense Workshop]()](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4326994/45677AA880CBDA012F68271B79308E89?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4368597/432902F5CF3D8A8C5996395371884A06?partnerref=eventpage)

### [Access Control Time Machine: From Past Pioneers to Future Frontiers](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

Discover how access control has evolved over the years. In this presentation by Gina Rodrigues, Vice President, Marketing at Aware, learn about key changes that have shaped access control practices and shed light on the cutting-edge technologies driving its future.

Then get expert insights from James Beecham, Founder and CEO of ALTR, Robert Eckel, CEO of Aware, and Lindsay Savarino, Senior Director of HR at Aware, to explore the varying perspectives different areas of business bring to the access control landscape.

Don’t miss this opportunity to delve into the changing landscape of access control and equip yourself with the knowledge to secure your organization’s privacy, assets, and data. 

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4368597/432902F5CF3D8A8C5996395371884A06?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4345307/32BED2C63A6831E8F5D1A8E4F0BBABBA?partnerref=eventpage)

[![Deepfake Defense Workshop]()](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4326994/45677AA880CBDA012F68271B79308E89?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4345307/32BED2C63A6831E8F5D1A8E4F0BBABBA?partnerref=eventpage)

### [Securing Healthcare: Combating Insurance Fraud with Biometrics & Behavioral Analysis](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

In this webinar, we will explore the growing problem of health insurance fraud and delve into the innovative solutions offered by biometric technology and behavioral analysis. Our speakers, Craig Herman from Aware, Inc. and Nelson Santini from BSI, will guide us through this critical subject.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4345307/32BED2C63A6831E8F5D1A8E4F0BBABBA?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4326994/45677AA880CBDA012F68271B79308E89?partnerref=eventpage)

[![Deepfake Defense Workshop]()](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4326994/45677AA880CBDA012F68271B79308E89?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4326994/45677AA880CBDA012F68271B79308E89?partnerref=eventpage)

### [Deepfake Defense Workshop: Proven Strategies for Safeguarding Your Security](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

The threat of deepfakes poses a significant risk to organizations worldwide. As deepfake technology continues to evolve, malicious actors are exploiting it to breach security measures, manipulate information, and compromise sensitive data. To help you stay one step ahead of these advanced threats, we are excited to present our “Deepfake Defense Workshop.”

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4326994/45677AA880CBDA012F68271B79308E89?partnerref=eventpage)

###  _Watch the Preview_

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4276062/08A2EA7FDE56434BBFCAC6F13167F7D6?partnerref=eventpage)

### [Helping Governments Deliver on the Promise of Digital ID](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

Watch this virtual session to learn more about how organizations and agencies can fully harness the power of digital ID.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4276062/08A2EA7FDE56434BBFCAC6F13167F7D6)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4198289/1110F176812CD26B3072539BA52D84BF?partnerref=eventpage)

[![Stop Identity Fraud Webinar]()](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4198289/1110F176812CD26B3072539BA52D84BF?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4198289/1110F176812CD26B3072539BA52D84BF?partnerref=eventpage)

### [How Biometrics Can Stop Synthetic Identity Fraud](https://www.fintechamericas.co/en/)

Synthetic identity fraud is a high-level con game of constructing seemingly authentic identities without any actual human beings behind them. The cost of identity fraud knows no borders, affecting banks, healthcare providers, retail establishments, governments and ultimately the end-users—and the alarming truth is that the value of these losses continues to skyrocket annually, contributing to significant losses in several sectors worldwide.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4198289/1110F176812CD26B3072539BA52D84BF?partnerref=eventpage)

[](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4152801/ED0DA50DD34039C4889CA19ECD261EB8?partnerref=eventpage)

[![Latent Logjam]()](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2965152/5EFA9BF44AD6367A34C59DEED3F504FD?partnerref=awarehomepageod)

### [Breaking the Latent Logjam](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4152801/ED0DA50DD34039C4889CA19ECD261EB8?partnerref=eventpage)

The identification of latent prints is a critical part of law enforcement’s arsenal, helping link potential suspects to crime scenes. Unfortunately, many agencies are experiencing a backlog in latent processing, resulting in increased time and expense, poor search results, and the possibility that criminals may escape prosecution. In this webinar, Scott Howard, Aware Director of Operations (AFIX/ABIS) will discuss some of the causes of backlogs, the steps necessary to address these challenges, and how AFIX Tracker can help agencies break the latent logjam.

[WATCH NOW](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4152801/ED0DA50DD34039C4889CA19ECD261EB8?partnerref=eventpage)

[![Webinar with Terry Riopka]()](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2965152/5EFA9BF44AD6367A34C59DEED3F504FD?partnerref=awarehomepageod)

### [The Intelligence of Mobile Biometrics](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/4117710/273FB2DF1B2F769B2E108B15411F07FD?partnerref=eventpage)

Mobile, cloud, machine learning, and software encryption technologies are advancing rapidly. Dr. Terry Riopka, Senior Director of Research at Aware, will present on these recent developments using biometrics as a case study. He will discuss how advanced mobile biometric applications can inform the development of remote intelligent systems in general, and talk about developing under the constraints of a mobile environment.
